description:
Kurt's hairy ass gets fucked by Harley!

I love Harley.

He's always in a good mood and the other guys always love being with him because he's such a charmer and he has a knack for making people feel comfortable.

I asked him before we got started if he would give sucking cock a try. Hell, for a straight guy, he's pretty wide open on anything else!

title: Harley & Kurt
